This patch adds digest creation logic (copied from signing method) before signtaure verification

Signature verification method in NSSCryptoKeyRSA.cpp does not follow digest creation in signature generation method. 
he Signtaure creation logic is changed (a disgest of hashbuffer is added) in 1.3.1  but the verification logic did not change in 1.3.1 or any subsequent versions.
